scripts.agents:pull: cd packages/elevenlabs-cli && bun run build && node dist/cli.js pull
scripts.agents:push: cd packages/elevenlabs-cli && bun run build && node dist/cli.js push
scripts.agents:deploy: cd packages/elevenlabs-cli && bun run build && node dist/cli.js deploy
scripts.agents:sync: cd packages/elevenlabs-cli && bun run build && node dist/cli.js sync
scripts.agents:status: cd packages/elevenlabs-cli && bun run build && node dist/cli.js status
